name: strawberry-jam
description: strawberry jam is my personal fork of the project jam created and developed by sxip.
author: glvckoma

scripts.pack:asar:public: npm run clean:public && npx asar pack assets/extracted-winapp-public assets/winapp.asar --unpack *.node
scripts.build:win:dev: npm run pack:asar:dev && npx electron-builder build -w
scripts.build:mac-docker:public: npm run clean:public && docker run --rm -v "%cd%":/project -v "%cd%/build":/project/build electronuserland/builder:wine /bin/bash -c "npm run pack:asar:public && npx electron-builder build --mac -c.mac.target=zip --x64 --arm64 -p never --config.asar=true --config.npmRebuild=true -c.mac.identity=null --config.electronDownload.mirror=https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron/"
scripts.publish:win: npm run version:patch && npm run build:win:public && npm run verify && npx electron-builder build -w -p always
scripts.publish:mac-docker: docker run --rm -e GH_TOKEN -v "%cd%":/project -v "%cd%/build":/project/build electronuserland/builder:wine /bin/bash -c "npm run pack:asar:public && npx electron-builder build --mac -c.mac.target=zip --x64 --arm64 -p always --config.asar=true --config.npmRebuild=true -c.mac.identity=null --config.electronDownload.mirror=https://npmmirror.com/mirrors/electron/"
